title: Secretariat - IOGP Europe
author: unknown
text:
Secretariat François-Régis Mouton Managing Director - IOGP Europe 
			
		 Policy Maria Karagiannidou-Rosiek Head of Policy - Europe 
			
		 Caterina De Matteis Senior Policy Manager Energy & Climate Policy 
			
		 Gabrielle van Melkebeke Senior Policy Manager, ESG and Environment

		 communications Nareg Terzian Head of Strategy & Communications - Europe 
			
		 Gabrielle Lelièvre Communications Manager 
			
		 Beri Retief Junior Officer Marketing and Communications

excerpt: The IOGP Europe secretariat is based in Brussels and coordinates its policy, communications, and outreach work.
